titlePart.entryReference: arrangements of seats for, or adaptation of seats to, vehicles

noteParagraph.text: The term "furniture" in this class also covers easels or stands, e.g. for blackboards or drawing tables.

titlePart.entryReference: cleaning quantities of bottles or of other hollow articles of one kind

noteParagraph.text: Machines or implements which can be used for cleaning windows, window shades, window screens, venetian blinds, as well as floors, carpets, furniture, walls, or wall coverings are classified in group or .

titlePart.text: Cleaning windows, window shades, window screens, venetian blinds
cleaning both sides of a window simultaneously
Hand apparatus with built-in electric motors
with provision for supplying liquids, e.g. cleaning agents
for cleaning one side with access from the other side only
with provision for supplying liquids, e.g. cleaning agents
with provision for supplying liquids, e.g. cleaning agents

Cleaning window shades, window screens, venetian blinds

Accessories facilitating cleaning, e.g. venetian blind separators, spreaders, or cleaning racks

titlePart.entryReference: pneumatically taking-up undesirable matter from roads or like surfaces

with power-driven air-pumps or air-compressors, e.g. driven by motor vehicle engine vacuum
cleaning by blowing-off, also combined with suction cleaning
with suction devices other than rotary fans
with ejectors, e.g. connected to motor vehicle exhaust

with means for connecting a hose

Suction cleaners adapted for additional purposes
Tables with suction openings for cleaning purposes
Containers for cleaning articles by suction
Suction cleaners adapted to cleaning of brushes
Suction cleaners adapted to taking-up liquids
with driven tools for special purposes
for using the exhaust air for other purposes, e.g. for distribution of chemicals in a room, for sterilisation of the air
for supporting the suction cleaner on the exhaust air
with combustion of dust in exhaust air

Storing devices specially adapted to suction cleaners or parts thereof
Carrying-vehicles specially adapted for suction cleaners
with fixed, e.g. adjustably fixed brushes or the like
Attachment of, or closures for bags
Arrangement or disposition of cyclones or other devices with centrifugal action

titlePart.entryReference: hoses and hose joints in general

Implements for cleaning floors, carpets, furniture, walls, or wall coverings
